name: Orange Kush
description: Orange Kush was bred by Green Devil Genetics and is the child of Orange Bud and OG Kush. It eases the body into relaxation while lifting moods with a sweet and tangy citrus flavor. This strain is resistant to most pests and mold and has long, dense buds with many orange hairs and trichome crystals.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Sleepy, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
